thread.title: Janet Street-Porter marries HERSELF on Loose Women and Coleen Nolan is her bridesmaid
thread.title_full: Janet Street-Porter marries HERSELF on Loose Women and Coleen Nolan is her bridesmaid

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Janet Street-Porter marries HERSELF on Loose Women and Coleen Nolan is her bridesmaid
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Janet Street-Porter might have been married four times before, but the 70 year old is willing to give it another go. 
But she’s not running the risk of wedding a dud so she found her perfect partner – by marrying HERSELF live on Loose Women . 
The red-haired panellist walked up the aisle of the chat show studio in a full white veil – holding a bouquet of roses. 
And her co-panellist Coleen Nolan even acted as her bridesmaid in a pink dress. Janet Street Porter got married on Loose Women (Photo: ITV) Coleen Nolan was bridesmaid (Photo: ITV) 
Once Janet had walked up the aisle instead of an anxious groom, she was confronted with a mirror. 
And retired footballer Frank Lampard was on hand to officiate – waiting with a certificate in hand. 
"Do you Janet, take you Janet to be your lawfully wedded Janet? " Frank asked. 
"Why the hell not," the blushing bride replied. Janet gazed at her reflection in a mirror (Photo: ITV) Frank Lampard oversaw the ceremony (Photo: ITV) 
The mum of three made the admission on Loose Women during a discussion about aggressive kids. 
The 51 year old’s sons Jake Roche, 24, and Shane Jr., 28, might be grown up now, but she admitted that she struggled to control them as children. 
“There were times when I smacked my boys because they were, I can’t swear on telly, little poo bags,” Coleen admitted. Coleen Nolan admitted to 'smacking' her sons when they were children (Photo: ITV) 
“I don’t mean I battered them it wasn't abuse,” she clarified. 
"But I smacked them on the back of the legs or the hand." 
She also reasoned that her boys “haven’t grown up violent” because of her actions. Like us on Facebook
